title: Card
description: Versatile content container combining image, text, actions, and metadata. Perfect for blog posts, features, team members, case studies, product listings, and marketing content.

metadata.description: Multi-purpose card component that combines heading, text, button, link, and badge atoms. Supports multiple layout variants, clickable cards, image positioning, metadata display, and marketing features like badges and tags.

accessibility.notes: Uses semantic <article> element by default. When clickable, renders as <a> with proper keyboard navigation and focus states. Image alt text required for accessibility.

responsive.notes: Horizontal variant stacks vertically on mobile. Icon and stat variants adjust padding. Image aspect ratios maintained across breakpoints.

usageExamples.title: Blog Post Card
usageExamples.description: Standard blog post with image, metadata, and read more button
usageExamples.code: {{ card({ image: { src: '/blog.jpg', alt: 'Post cover' }, title: 'How to Build Better Websites', description: 'Learn best practices...', metadata: { author: 'Jane Doe', date: 'Jan 15, 2024' }, tags: ['Tutorial'], actions: { primary: { text: 'Read More', href: '/blog/1' } } }) }}

usageExamples.title: Clickable Feature Card
usageExamples.description: Entire card is clickable with badge overlay
usageExamples.code: {{ card({ clickable: true, href: '/feature', badge: { text: 'New', variant: 'primary' }, title: 'AI Page Builder', description: 'Build pages with natural language.' }) }}

usageExamples.title: Icon Card
usageExamples.code: {{ card({ variant: 'icon', icon: '<svg>...</svg>', title: 'Fast Performance', description: 'Built for speed.' }) }}

usageExamples.title: Stat Card
usageExamples.code: {{ card({ variant: 'stat', stat: { value: '10,000+', label: 'Happy Customers' } }) }}

usageExamples.title: Horizontal Layout
usageExamples.code: {{ card({ variant: 'horizontal', image: { src: '/team.jpg', alt: 'Team member' }, title: 'Jane Doe', description: 'Senior Designer' }) }}

usageExamples.title: Overlay Card
usageExamples.code: {{ card({ variant: 'overlay', image: { src: '/hero.jpg', alt: 'Background' }, title: 'Stunning Design', description: 'Beautiful overlays.' }) }}

marketingFeatures: Hover lift effect for interactivity signals
Fully clickable card option for better UX
Badge overlay support for callouts (New, Featured, Sale)
Multiple aspect ratios for consistent grids
Stat cards for social proof and metrics
Metadata display for author, date, category

variant.description: Layout variant: 'default' (vertical), 'horizontal' (side-by-side), 'overlay' (text on image), 'minimal' (no border/shadow), 'icon' (centered icon), 'stat' (large number)

clickable.description: Makes entire card clickable as a link (better UX than small button)

src.description: Image URL (required if image is used)

aspectRatio.description: Image aspect ratio for consistent grid heights

badge.description: Badge overlay displayed in top-right corner (e.g., 'New', 'Featured', 'Sale')

icon.description: SVG icon HTML for icon variant (centered, 48x48px)

tags.description: Array of tag strings displayed as small badges

id.description: Unique identifier for the component instance

ariaDescribedBy.description: ID of element that describes this component

role.description: ARIA role override (default: 'article' or implicit link role)
